amendment.description: To strike section 21, relating to whisteblower protections.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4096 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 4096 proposed by Senator DeMint. (consideration: CR S1502, S1506-1510, S1515-1518; text: CR S1502) To strike section 21, relating to whisteblower protections.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4096 proposed by Senator DeMint.
